medical_history.chief_complaint: Swelling and discomfort in the right leg.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately a year ago with subtle and intermittent swelling and discomfort in the right leg, progressing over time and eventually prompting the patient to seek medical attention.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had no prior history of trauma or similar conditions to the affected leg.
medical_history.social_history: The patient is a 55-year-old well-fit male with a distinguished career in military service.
